name: CrimsonCTRL
tagline: Native Android application for the CrimsonUniverse
body:
### Welcome to CrimsonCTRL
This project is part of the CrimsonUniverse which contains:

* **CrimsonCore**

A SparkCore Microcontroller ([Spark.io](https://www.spark.io/)). This is the master control unit of the project, attached to the CrimsonCore is a photo resistor to measure the brightness. If nights fall a relay is switched on and the light of the StoneCircle is switched on. Furthermore a DS18B20 is measuring the temperature. Last not least a [Digole 1,8" OLED display](http://www.digole.com/index.php?productID=859) is used to visualise the data.
* **CrimsonControl**

Is a HTML5 frontend that receives the data from the SparkCloud.

* **CrimsonCAM**

Is a camera module attached to a Raspberry PI. The software [motion](http://www.lavrsen.dk/foswiki/bin/view/Motion/WebHome) is used for motion-tracking.

* **CrimsonCTRL**

This project is a native Android application. You can manual switch the Stone Cirle Light on or off and get the temperature and the values from the photo resistor


***


### Support or Contact
Of course you see, this is highly specialised project based on my own needs, feel free to have a look at my code and use it for your own needs.
